definition: Zelda (in Legend of Zelda video game) (Tw, HK, Macau)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: Zoe Saldana actors wear clothes and her personality.
sentences.chinese: 佐伊薩爾達尼亞演員穿的衣服和她的個性。

sentences.english: He said this was an essential skill in the city.
sentences.chinese: 拉皮薩爾達說，在該市這是一項必備技能。
